pages.title: Description
pages.text: Food has become increasingly scarce as the planet cools, and you can't grow crops without $(6) Greenhouse $(). $(br2) You will need to rely on such items to replenish your satiety level when it drops.

pages.title: Content Changes
pages.text: $(3) Apple Skin/Core $() The mod paints the material of satiety in detail and adds a yellow border for saturation. $(br2) And adds a mesh bar after the satiety level to indicate the level of satiety consumption. $(br2)And $(3) Spice of Life $() mod restrict the behavior of the same food to be eaten all the time.

pages.title: Access To Food
pages.text: So is there no way to get food or not? $(br2) Don't worry, read on.

pages.title: Gardens
pages.text: Occasionally, you may come across small or large patches of $(6) vegetable gardens $() in the field. $(br2)$(2)Shift+left-click $() to take down the crop and $(2)Shift+right-click $() to take down the vegetable garden. $(br2) These are just the basic ingredients, they only restore $(c)1 $() points of satiety, you can create some cooking utensils and use these ingredients to cook delicious food.

pages.title: Void Mining
pages.text: First you need to prepare a $(6) Void Botanic Miner $(). $(br2) It can collect $(6)Botania Flowers $() in addition to the vanilla $(6) Seeds $() and other items. $(br2) This is also the only way to get the original crop $(c) (now breaking the grass won't drop anything) $().

pages.title: Hunting
pages.text: Although it is very cold outside, there are still a few animals out and about, such as the $(d)rabbit $(). $(br2) They are fast moving and you can use long-range weapons such as $(6) bow and arrow $() or $(6) gun $() to capture them. $(br2) Of course, $(d)rabbits $() are not the only ones that can spawn, other animals have a very small chance of spawning as well.
